title: Streaming again

embed.description: meta.description || 'hitbox is a service where you can watch live broadcasts of video games in high quality with near-to-no-delay. Watch, chat, and interact with people passionate about gaming.'}}

body:
Streaming again, had a break for 8 months of streaming. Since its late and i didnt get to stream for people earlier, tonight is just a test run. Enjoy

http://www.hitbox.tv/GizzelLoL
